Package io.luverolla.gradi.services

Class EntityService<E extends CodedEntity>

java.lang.Object
io.luverolla.gradi.services.EntityService<E>
Type Parameters:
E - entity type, derived from CodedEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageService, ResourceService, ResourceTypeService, UserService
public abstract class EntityService<E extends CodedEntity>
extends Object
Generic service class with essential CRUD and utility methods

  • Method Details

    • nextCode

      public static String nextCode()
      Gets next unique code for entity
      Returns:
      unique code

    • getComparatorMap

      protected abstract Map<String,​Comparator<E>> getComparatorMap()
      Get comparators map for entity type. Comparators map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a comparator class, under the comparators subpackage
        • , that compares according to that property
      Returns:
      comparators map

    • getFilterMap

      protected abstract Map<String,​Filter<E,​?>> getFilterMap()
      Get filters map for entity type. Filters map is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the name of a property belonging to the given entity type
      • value is a filter class, under the filters subpackage
        • , that filters according to that property
      Returns:
      filters map

    • repo

      protected abstract org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<E,​String> repo()

    • getComparator

      protected Comparator<E> getComparator​(Map.Entry<String,​String> m)
      Gets an instance of the right comparator, from the Comparators map, according to sorting map Map is in (key, value) format, where:
      • key is the property's name we want to sort by
      • value is the sorting way, and can be asc or desc
      Parameters:
      m - sorting map
      Returns:
      instance of comparator class or null in case of invalid sorting string

    • getFilter

      protected Filter<E,​?> getFilter​(Map.Entry<String,​?> m)
      Gets an instance of the right filter, from the Filters map, according to filter rule Filter rule is a (key, value) map, where:
      • key is the property we want to filter by
      • value is the value, or the values, the filter takes as arguments
      Parameters:
      m - filter rule
      Returns:
      instance of filter class or null in case of invalid filter rule

    • chainComparators

      protected ChainedComparator<E> chainComparators​(EntitySetRequest req)
      Creates a chained comparator, according to REST request
      Parameters:
      req - REST request
      Returns:
      chained comparator class, or null in case of invalid request

    • chainFilters

      protected ChainedFilter<E> chainFilters​(EntitySetRequest req)
      Creates a chained filter, according to REST request
      Parameters:
      req - REST request
      Returns:
      chained filter class, or null in case of invalid request

    • get

      public SortedSet<E> get​(EntitySetRequest req)
      Get collection of data according to request Data is sorted, filtered and paged according to given EntitySetRequest object
      Parameters:
      req - given request object
      Returns:
      set of data

    • get

      public E get​(String code)
      Retrieves single entity by its code
      Parameters:
      code - given entity's code
      Returns:
      entity object, if it exists
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if entity doesn't exist

    • add

      public Set<E> add​(Collection<E> data)
      Adds collection of entities Each entity gets an unique code assigned
      Parameters:
      data - data to add
      Returns:
      saved objects, with unique codes
      See Also:
      nextCode()

    • update

      public abstract E update​(String code, E data) throws NoSuchElementException
      Updates given entity with new data Data to update depends on entity type, so this needs to be implemented
      Parameters:
      code - given entity's code
      data - new entity data
      Returns:
      updated entity, if it exists
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if entity doesn't exist
